name: entity.presentDetails
desc: Provide custom flexpane behavior for Work Objects. Apps call this endpoint to send per-user flexpane metadata to the client.

metadata.desc: URL-encoded JSON object containing flexpane metadata from the app that will be conformed to a Work Object metadata schema, keyed by entity ID.

trigger_id.desc: A reference to the original user action that initiated the request.

user_auth_required.desc: Set to true (or 1) to indicate that the user must authenticate to view full flexpane data.

user_auth_url.desc: A custom URL to which users are directed for authentication if required.

errors.invalid_metadata: The provided `metadata` argument could not be parsed or understood.
errors.invalid_app_id: App ID is not a valid format
errors.user_auth_url_missing: User auth url is required if user_auth_required is true
errors.entity_metadata_does_not_match_trigger: The provided entity's ID does not match the ID of the entity used to initiate the request
errors.missing_interactivity_url: App does not have an interactivity URL configured
errors.missing_options_load_url: App does not have an options load URL configured
